=== Testing VPMOVZXWQ ===

Test 1: 128-bit operand
Source: [0x8000, 0x7FFF]
Result: [0x0000000000008000, 0x0000000000007FFF]
Expected: [0x0000000000008000, 0x0000000000007FFF]
Test 1 PASSED

Test 2: 256-bit operand
Source: [0x8000, 0x7FFF, 0x0000, 0xFFFF]
Result: [0x0000000000008000, 0x0000000000007FFF, 0x0000000000000000, 0x000000000000FFFF]
Expected: [0x0000000000008000, 0x0000000000007FFF, 0x0000000000000000, 0x000000000000FFFF]
Test 2 PASSED
